html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06552024-06-10DFO
ActOceans Act
SubjectTang.ɢwan — ḥačxʷiqak — Tsigis Marine Protected Area Regulations
PrecisTANG.GWAN - HACXWIQAK - TSIGIS MARINE PROTECTED AREA REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish the boundaries of the Tang.gwan - hacxwiqak - Tsigis Marine Protected Area (MPA), including the proposed zoning approach; (2) prohibit activities that are likely to disturb, damage, destroy, or remove any living marine organism or any part of its habitat; (3) identify specific exceptions to allow certain activities that do not compromise the conservation objectives identified for the MPA; (4) define the criteria for the approval of activity plans authorizing scientific research and monitoring and educational activities in the MPA; and (5) repeal the Endeavour Hydrothermal Vents Marine Protected Area Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0122 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
